text:
"The Amazing Spider-Man 2" is an 2014 superhero-action movie directed by Marc Webb. It is a sequel to the 2012 Spider-Man movie "The Amazing Spider-Man". Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx, Dane DeHaan, Paul Giamatti, Martin Sheen, Denis Leary, Colm Feore, Chris Cooper, Sally Field, Chris Zylka, Marton Csokas, and Felicity Jones are in the cast.
Hans Zimmer composed the music for the movie. Spider-Man co-creator Stan Lee once again had a cameo appearance as a graduation guest. It was released on May 2, 2014.
The film starts with Richard Parker uploading a video explaining why he is disapearing. While on the plane, an assassin comes & attempts to kill Richard & Mary, the plane the crashes. After the events of the first film, Spider-Man is trying to stop Alexi Syetsevich hijacking an Oscorp truck filled with plutonium.
